item.title: Mod please lock this!
item.dc:creator: @GodexCAB GodexCAB
item.description:
@GodexCAB wrote:

[quote=“furyking50, post:53, topic:517200”][quote author=Arcik link=topic=635461.msg4285749#msg4285749 date=1366311506]
You need to issue out a client and portforward. I would love to play (not really) and it looks like an amazing server (sarcasm) but I have 0 knowledge of Java (idk how to make a client) and wtf’s Hamachi (looks like a virus). How comes all the other servers are “non hamatchi” and have webclients and it’s all click “play now” and you’re in!

If you say “idk how to i’m a noob” then try again once you have found the tutorial section!

^ That’s my opinion but really I think its a great server and you’ll end up quitting in under a month but who cares!
(only trying to make you work harder for your own benefit because I care so much for you)
[/quote] you are so dumm hamachi is a thing that lets yo create a network without VIPs nor port forwarding hamachi isn’t a virus you sound like you don’t know anything about rsps gtfo[/quote]

Haha, thanks. And Hamachi is a program that lets you create a Network and people can join your network to play your RSPS if you can not or don’t know how to port forward. The only reason I use Hamachi is because I CAN NOT port forward with my current router. I even contacted my internet provider about it. I only use Hamachi untill I buy a VPS. Why don’t you do some reading and find out what Hamachi is. And you would be surprised at how many RSPS users actually use Hamachi. It is NOT a virus, so if you think it is, please leave and go read, then come back and tell me what you think.

Read full topic

Do you realise that this is a [shadow=red,left]317[/shadow]? Pretty much like old-school graphics… That might be why you think it looks bad, maybe you are used to playing higher graphic games. If so, [size=14pt]please exscuse yourself [/size]because I do NOT want hate comments on here.

If you are used to playing 317’s, why does my server look awful “(unlike others)” ?? Please explain. I want to make my server better.[/quote]

I’m talking about the way you presented your server, the game frame, and the shitty staff management.
